title: Was Hillary Clinton responsible for the Wako massacre?
subtitle: Clinton was not in any position to give it the authority to order or escalate the blockade, which ended with the death of 76 members of religious communities in 1993.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Hillary Clinton was responsible for the siege of the Davidian branch compound in Wako, Texas, which ended in the lives of 76 civilians.
